html: this is a rebellious people. Isaiah lists in a book the iniquities of the people of Judah—they are rebellious, lying children, who will not hear the law of the Lord. They refuse to hearken to their prophets and seers but tell them to "See not;…Prophesy not…, speak…smooth things,…get…out of the way,…cause the Holy One of Israel to cease from before us" (30:10-11).
